eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: This event is emitted when a token swap is executed.

eventDecorators.name: Paused
eventDecorators.description: This event is emitted when a token swap is executed.

eventDecorators.name: Received
eventDecorators.description: This event is emitted when a token swap is executed. allow contract to receive funds.

eventDecorators.name: TransferFailed
eventDecorators.description: This event is emitted when a token swap is executed.

eventDecorators.name: TransferSuccessful
eventDecorators.description: This event is emitted when a token swap is executed. Event to notify if transfer successful or failed after account approval verified.

eventDecorators.name: Unpaused
eventDecorators.description: This event is emitted when a token swap is executed.

functionDecorators.name: addNewToken
functionDecorators.description: add address of token to list of supported tokens using token symbol as identifier in mapping.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: removeToken
functionDecorators.description: remove address of token we no more support.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferTokens
functionDecorators.description: method that handles transfer of ERC20 tokens to other address it assumes the calling address has approved this contract as spender.

parameterDecorators.name: symbol_
parameterDecorators.description: identifier mapping to a token contract address.
